content: That's a lot of helpful information, thanks! I'll definitely keep those tips in mind. One thing I'm still unsure about is how to achieve a smooth, even finish on the model. I've heard that using an airbrush can make a big difference, but I'm not entirely sure how to use it effectively. I did get a new airbrush and compressor a couple of weeks ago, and I've been practicing with it, but I'm still getting used to the feel and control of it.
